requirements.plaintext: The Subterranean Trials of Drake and Serpent

steps.plaintext: Teleport to the northeastern-most waypoint at Evernight Temple
steps.markdown: Teleport to the northeastern-most waypoint at ◀Evernight Temple▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Evernight_Temple▷

steps.plaintext: Head east towards a labyrinth puzzle and interact with a mechanism to switch to Whitenight if not already in Whitenight
steps.markdown: Head east towards a labyrinth puzzle and interact with a mechanism to switch to ◀Whitenight▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Whitenight▷ if not already in Whitenight

steps.plaintext: There are two Triangular Mechanisms, hit both of them just once to solve the puzzle
steps.markdown: There are two ◀Triangular Mechanisms▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Triangular_Mechanism▷, hit both of them just once to solve the puzzle

steps.plaintext: Navigate through the labyrinth and activate the four Hydro Monuments to open the floor gate in the center of the labyrinth.
steps.markdown: Navigate through the labyrinth and activate the four ◀Hydro Monuments▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Hydro_Monument▷ to open the floor gate in the center of the labyrinth.

steps.plaintext: Go through the floor gate and open the chest to obtain  Date's Medal of Recognition
steps.markdown: Go through the floor gate and open the chest to obtain <img:dates_medal_of_recognition> ◀Date's Medal of Recognition▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Date%27s_Medal_of_Recognition▷

steps.plaintext: Talk to the nearby Shade of Tokoyo to start this World Quest
steps.markdown: Talk to the nearby ◀Shade of Tokoyo▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Shade_of_Tokoyo▷ to start this World Quest
